attributes.action: SAVE THE ROYAL NAVY FROM DEFENCE CUTS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: ALFRED the Great in 897 created the English Royal Navy. The Norman Kings set up a great naval force in 1155. Under the Tudors the fleet was revived in a great building programme. In the 19th and 20th Century the senior service saved our island races from many invasion threats. We call on the British Government to stop talking fine words about our armed forces, and put financial and political words into action to save our fleet being lost forever.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "SAVE THE ROYAL NAVY FROM DEFENCE CUTS."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15292.asp

Prime Minister's Office
